member.name: T:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer
member.summary: AWS Signature Version 4 authentication implementation for S3-compatible requests. Implements AWS SigV4 specification with presigned URL support. Based on Minio.NET V4Authenticator architecture for compatibility with all S3-compatible storage systems. See: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/signature-version-4.html

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.SignRequest(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Signs an HTTP request with AWS Signature Version 4. Called for each HTTP request to add the Authorization header with computed signature. Implementation follows AWS SigV4 signing process: 1. Compute content hash (for request body) 2. Set required headers (Host, x-amz-date, x-amz-content-sha256) 3. Build canonical request (method + URI + query + headers + payload hash) 4. Hash canonical request 5. Build string to sign (algorithm + date + scope + canonical request hash) 6. Generate signing key (multi-level HMAC) 7. Compute final signature (HMAC of string to sign) 8. Add Authorization header to request Based on Minio.NET V4Authenticator implementation.
member.param: Optional pre-computed SHA256 hash of payload. If null, will use appropriate default.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.GeneratePresignedGetUrl(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Generates a presigned GET URL for unauthenticated download access. Presigned URLs embed the SigV4 signature in the query string, allowing unauthenticated clients (browsers, curl, etc.) to access objects without credentials. The URL is time-limited and automatically expires after the specified duration.
AWS S3 Specification: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/ShareObjectPreSignedURL.html - Expiry range: 1 second to 604800 seconds (7 days) - Supports temporary credentials (session tokens) - Uses UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD (no body hash required)
member.param: Whether to use HTTPS (true) or HTTP (false)
Name of the bucket containing the object
URL validity period in seconds (1-604800, default: 3600 = 1 hour)
member.exception: When expiresInSeconds is less than 1 or greater than 604800

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.GeneratePresignedPutUrl(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary:
Generates a presigned PUT URL for unauthenticated upload access. Presigned URLs embed the SigV4 signature in the query string, allowing unauthenticated clients (web forms, mobile apps) to upload objects without exposing credentials. The URL is time-limited and automatically expires after the specified duration.
AWS S3 Specification: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/PresignedUrlUploadObject.html - Expiry range: 1 second to 604800 seconds (7 days) - Supports temporary credentials (session tokens) - Client MUST use PUT method when uploading - Optional: Specify Content-Type to enforce upload content type
member.param: Whether to use HTTPS (true) or HTTP (false)
Name of the bucket to upload to
Object key (destination file path within bucket)
URL validity period in seconds (1-604800, default: 3600 = 1 hour)
Optional Content-Type to enforce. If specified, client must use this exact Content-Type when uploading.
member.exception: When expiresInSeconds is less than 1 or greater than 604800

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.BuildCanonicalPresignedRequestWithContentType(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds canonical request for presigned URL with Content-Type header. Per AWS S3 spec, when Content-Type is specified in presigned URL, it must be included in the canonical request and the client must use the same Content-Type. See: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/PresignedUrlUploadObject.html

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.DeriveSigningKey(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Derives the signing key using AWS Signature V4 multi-level HMAC chain. Implements the 4-level HMAC derivation as per AWS specification: 1. HMAC-SHA256(AWS4+secretKey, date) 2. HMAC-SHA256(result, region) 3. HMAC-SHA256(result, service) 4. HMAC-SHA256(result, "aws4_request") Based on Minio.NET implementation for optimal performance.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.SignHmac(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte},System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: HMAC-SHA256 implementation for modern .NET using ReadOnlySpan for efficiency. Based on Minio.NET V4Authenticator pattern.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.BytesToHex(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Converts bytes to hexadecimal string (lowercase). AWS SigV4 requires hex encoding of hashes.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.ComputePayloadHashAsync(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of stream content for payload signing. Required for AWS SigV4 authentication to verify request integrity. Handles stream position reset to allow content reuse.
member.param: Stream to hash (will be reset to original position if seekable)

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.AwsSignatureV4Signer.ComputePayloadHashSync(System.String)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of string content for payload signing (synchronous). Required for AWS SigV4 authentication when payload is a string.

member.name: T:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder
member.summary: Builder for creating OmnixStorageClient instances with fluent configuration. Provides a clean, type-safe way to configure the S3-compatible client.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithEndpoint(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the endpoint (server address:port).

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithCredentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the credentials.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithAdminCredentials(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets admin credentials used for admin endpoints (JWT login). These are NOT S3 access keys and should be console/admin credentials.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithAdminToken(System.String)
member.summary: Sets an admin JWT token to use for admin endpoints. If provided, the client will not call the login endpoint.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithSSL(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enables SSL/TLS (default: false).

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithSessionToken(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the session token for temporary credentials (IAM roles, STS). Required when using temporary security credentials. See: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/RESTAuthentication.html

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the region for request signing (default: us-east-1).

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithRequestTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the request timeout.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.WithMaxRetries(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the maximum number of retries for failed requests.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientBuilder.Build
member.summary: Builds and returns the OmnixStorageClient.

member.name: T:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient
member.summary:
S3-compatible client for OmnixStorage distributed object storage. Uses AWS Signature Version 4 for authentication, compatible with all S3-compatible storage systems.
Key Features: - Full S3 API compatibility (buckets, objects, presigned URLs) - AWS SigV4 authentication (industry standard) - Async/await support throughout - Automatic request retry with exponential backoff - Presigned URL generation for GET/PUT operations - Multi-tenant support with admin operations
Architecture: This client uses direct AWS SigV4 signing for S3 operations (stateless, no JWT required). Admin operations use separate authentication for multi-tenant management. Based on analysis of Minio.NET SDK for optimal S3 compatibility.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the OmnixStorageClient.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient.GetBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets the base URL for API requests.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient.MakeRequestAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpContent,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.String)
member.summary: Makes an HTTP request with AWS SigV4 authentication and retry logic. Implements exponential backoff for transient failures.
member.param: HTTP method (GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, HEAD)
Optional pre-computed SHA256 hash of payload
member.exception: Thrown when request fails after all retries

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient.GeneratePresignedUrl(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an AWS SigV4 presigned URL for direct object access. Supports GET and PUT methods with optional Content-Type enforcement for PUT.
member.param: Optional Content-Type for PUT (enforces upload type)

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClient.DisposeAsync
member.summary: Disposes the HTTP client.

member.name: T:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for IOmnixStorageClient providing simplified method signatures. These methods wrap the Args-based API with more convenient overloads.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions.MakeBucketAsync(OmnixStorage.IOmnixStorageClient,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new bucket.
member.param: Name of the bucket to create.

member.summary: Removes a bucket (must be empty).
member.param: Name of the bucket to remove.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions.PutObjectAsync(OmnixStorage.IOmnixStorageClient,System.String,System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Uploads an object to the bucket.
member.returns: Result containing ETag and other upload information.

member.summary: Downloads an object from the bucket.
member.param: Stream to write the object data to.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions.StatObjectAsync(OmnixStorage.IOmnixStorageClient,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets object metadata without downloading the object.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions.RemoveObjectAsync(OmnixStorage.IOmnixStorageClient,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes an object from the bucket.
member.param: Name of the object to remove.

member.name: M:OmnixStorage.OmnixStorageClientExtensions.ListObjectsAsync(OmnixStorage.IOmnixStorageClient,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lists objects in a bucket.
member.param: Maximum number of objects to return (optional).
member.returns: List result containing objects and pagination information.

member.summary: Generates a presigned URL for downloading an object.
member.param: How long the URL should be valid.
